rules_text:
When Sacrament of Penance enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Sacrament of Penance leaves the battlefield.
At the beginning of each upkeep, suppress all creatures that share a creature type with the exiled card. [i](A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)[/i]
notes: fluffy: this looked like it wanted to be a trigger at each upkeep since suppress is an action word? so I made it an each upkeep trigger
